events.text: Runner, we understand the inherent limitations of your kind, thus we have provided you with a shield to defend yourself.
But donâ€™t trust [s]us[/s] it too much, if it takes enough of a beating your feeble body will not be able to handle the aftershock.
[i]Press [wave amp=50 freq=2]X[/wave] to activate your shield. If it overloads or if your health is depleted, you will die[/i]
